channel.title: Use text for the Reversing Hourglass:
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Use text for the Reversing Hourglass:" - Please add it to the wiki.

item.title: Use text for the Reversing Hourglass:
item.content:encoded:
Reversing Hourglass Used!
The Next successful Bingo Attempt against you does not Bingo you (does not expire)
You are surrounded by a pulsating aura!

I'd add it myself, 'cept I'm don't really know how y'all want the item pages to be formatted.
Anyways, if anyone on this forum bingoes me, please post any extra text that appears at the end of the attempt.
